overallStyle: Cinematic, futuristic, surreal music video with strong high-concept sci-fi influences. Two parallel worlds—water and volcanic—with completely different temperatures, physics, and visual languages, unified by shared height, floating structures, and emotional parallel.

influences.aspect: Environmental mood and atmosphere, scale of landscapes, color saturation in hostile environments
Floating isolation, suspended physics, slow-motion vulnerability in hostile space
Submerged consciousness, water as metaphor for time and identity, contemplative pacing
Volcanic ruins aesthetic, lone warrior against overwhelming architecture, environmental combat
Widescreen scale, minimal dialogue, environment as character, slow deliberate movement
Natural light interaction with human form, contemplative emotional weight without exposition

colorPalette.mood: Two contrasting palettes: cool subdued teal-blue for water world, hot intense orange-red for volcanic world. Both share darkness as a base and use accent color as environmental energy.

lightingSignature.quality: Cinematic dramatic with world-specific character. Water world uses soft ambient and refracted light. Volcanic world uses harsh directional uplight from lava.
sources: Water: refracted ambient light, caustic patterns, bioluminescent architecture, soft diffused glow
Volcanic: molten lava uplight, glowing structural cracks, ember particles, heat haze
Both: environmental light only, no artificial key lights that break the world logic
lightingSignature.signature: Water world: caustic light patterns rippling across skin and surfaces, soft ethereal glow. Volcanic world: dramatic uplight casting orange-red glow from below, heat distortion warping edges, rim lighting from lava.

texture.quality: Cinematic realism with slight stylization. Surfaces feel tangible and weathered.
emphasis: Water world: smooth organic curves, refracted light on skin, floating fabric textures, caustic water patterns, translucent architectural surfaces
Volcanic world: cracked rock, exposed structural metal, ash coating, molten glow in crevices, heat-damaged materials, ember-scarred surfaces

atmosphere.depth: Both worlds use atmospheric depth to create scale. Water world uses particle-filled water space and layered translucency. Volcanic world uses ash, ember particles, and heat haze.
effects: Water world: floating particles (motes, bubbles), caustic light refractions, underwater physics on hair/fabric, gentle currents
Volcanic world: falling ash, rising ember sparks, heat haze distortion, glowing cracks, platform collapse debris
Shared: height and floating structures in both worlds, atmospheric depth suggesting vast scale

forbiddenElements: visible text, logos, or on-screen explanations
melodrama or chaotic editing for its own sake
bright cheerful colors in either world
negativePromptBase: no text, logos, watermarks, distorted anatomy, cartoon style, flat lighting, plastic skin, modern objects, cheerful colors, literal backstory elements, on-screen text, camera shake
notes: The two worlds should share a sense of HEIGHT and FLOATING STRUCTURES but with completely different temperatures and physics. Water world: cool, slow, resistant but supportive. Volcanic world: hot, fast, hostile and demanding. All symbolism through environment, posture, and motion—never through text, icons, or literal narrative. Overall tone: melancholic, serious, contemplative. Emotionally heavy but never melodramatic.
